name: Etrenal Struggle
description:
Enjoy the fresh feels to play a fantasy on pen and paper (well, more like pencil and paper but you get the idea), as we get a glimpse at the world of eternal Struggle. In this world the forces of good an evil are trapped in an endless cycle.  Here you will alternate between the hero and the villain to fight the opposing forces, and if you do an incredible feat during your run you will aid your forces, but beware, this will make the next run more difficult since you will be changing perspectives with each run.

This is an entry for the Third  Extra Credit Game Jam, with  the theme of cycles.

Warnings: Sprites sometimes move very quickly and make the screen can flash temporarily. Also the sound can be loud at some points

----------------------

Controls:

Movement: Arrow-Keys

Attack: X

*****It DOESN'T support gamepads or controllers*****

If you want to use gamepads you will need aid from a third party software
-----------------------

Music by: Bensounds.com

Programming by: Lunlan

Art and Design by: BBQCute
